name: Centerville AIR Techs LLC
about: Centerville Air Techs LLC is a reputable flight training institution based in Centerville, Iowa. Our school is dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education and training programs. With a team of experienced and certified instructors, we offer a range of courses including private pilot, instrument rating, commercial pilot, and multi-engine training. We also provide flight reviews, BFRs, and IPCs. Our facility is equipped with modern aircraft and training tools to ensure students receive comprehensive and safe flight instruction. Centerville Air Techs LLC is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals with professionalism and excellence. We strive to make every flight training experience both educational and enjoyable.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
